title: Asset Tracker v2 A-GNSS request
description: Describes the format used by the device to request A-GNSS data.

mcc.description: Mobile country code. In contrast to roaming information (which uses the Modem Information data), neighboring cell measurement reports contain mcc and mnc as separate integers, instead of a string.

cell.description: The cell ID the User Equipment (UE) is camped on. 4-byte Evolved Terrestrial Radio Access Network (E-UTRAN) cell ID.

types.description: The A-GNSS data types to return. 1 = GPS UTC, 2 = GPS Ephemerides, 3 = GPS Almanac, 4 = Klobuchar Ionospheric Correction, 5 = Nequick Ionospheric Correction, 6 = GPS Time of Week, 7 = GPS System Clock, 8 = Location (lat/lon of cell), 9 = GPS Integrity, 11 = QZSS Almanac, 12 = QZSS Ephemerides, 13 = QZSS Integrity
